other_tests.findings: Normal swallowing mechanism; abnormal mucosal pattern of the esophagus, with multiple reticulations and a cobblestone appearance; longitudinal muscular hypertrophy.

other_tests.procedure_name: Computed Tomography (CT) of the neck and thorax
other_tests.findings: Hypodensity in the right thyroid gland, mildly patulous oropharynx and hypopharynx, thickening and irregularity of the esophagus, right hilar and mediastinal lymphadenopathy up to 2.1 cm in diameter, multiple small and low-attenuation lesions in the liver, perihepatic ascites, and circumferential thickening of the gallbladder wall.

other_tests.procedure_name: Fine-needle aspiration and core biopsy of the liver
other_tests.findings: Medium-size cells with oval nuclei and distinct nucleoli, consistent with large lymphoid cells indicative of diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma.
